item.name: savePostCacheTest
item.description: Added new post to the cache where all the posts have lower rank should make it the top ranked post

item.name: DeletePostCacheTest
item.description: Deletion of Post that is in cache would lead to its disappearance from cache and replacement by another post from DB

item.name: UpdatePostTest
item.description: Updated post score makes it higher due to the formula. Among other posts with low rank this should become the top 1 post.

item.name: downvotePostCacheTest Copy
item.description:
Testing Strategy would be, downvote all of the posts,

for example: post1: -1, post2: -3, post3: -5.

negative number represents a downvote.

After that downvote the highest ranked post and observe closesly how by GET top_posts it will move in the order. first cache.size posts are in cache. You can reassure that by the logger messages.

item.name: upvotePostCacheTest
item.description: The act of upvoting should increase the score of the post and either bring it into the cache if its score is high enough relatively to others OR change the order of posts if its already in the cache.
